name: Beaver
description: Beaver is a meme token that combines humor, community spirit, and crypto culture into one playful package. Inspired by the relentless, hardworking nature of its namesake, Beaver represents creativity, chaos, and the power of decentralized fun. Designed for meme lovers and blockchain believers alike, it’s building a unique space in the crypto forest where entertainment meets innovation. With strong community vibes and viral potential, Beaver isn’t just another token—it’s a symbol of what happens when memes meet mission.
